page.title: 01WARMSWORTH
page.content: {Warmsworth}is a moderately peaceful place to live in. It is an urban area, unlike 200 years ago when it was a rural village. Warmsworth has changed a great deal in the last 100 years. Motorways, new houses and farmland have almost taken over the old{Warmsworth,}yet some houses remain from the 14th and 15th centuries. {Warmsworth}is situated on the western edge of{Doncaster,}from which it is difficult to distinguish. To the North of{Warmsworth}lies the River Don and Sprotborough. To the South is the pit village of{Edlington}where coal is mined. The local industries are {quarrying}and{mining. }Most people commute from Warmsworth to nearby towns and cities. The overall impression of{Warmsworth}is that it is a pleasant place to live.
